Well done, Cherry Hill High School East student artists!", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NJ50000493/Centricity/Domain/1095/Painting_Art_7.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "670", "imageAltText": "Painting by Ryleigh Moule", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "Watch Video", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "5883", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Rosa Middle School Virtual A Cappella Performance", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "The 7th and 8th graders in the Rosa Middle School a cappella groups Rosettes and Close Harmony, under the direction of Mr. Scott Graser, recorded the song “Hold Me, Rock Me” from their individual homes to create a stirring video! ", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NJ50000493/Centricity/Domain/1095/District_of_Character_Updated.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "670", "imageAltText": "West and East Students Collaborate on Kickoff of National District of Character Celebration 2018", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ju_KNWhwBsM&t=15s", "linkText": "Video of National District of Character Celebration", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "5473", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "CHPS Volunteer Receives First "Heart of the District" Award", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Mr. Joel Fleisher, volunteer in CHPS kindergarten classrooms for the last 16 years of his retirement, was honored with the Board of Education's "Heart of the District" award on January 14, 2020.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NJ50000493/Centricity/Domain/1095/Updated_Joel_Heart_of_District.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "670", "imageAltText": "Heart of the District award winner Joel Fleisher with teachers", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G99I-BpY7UE&feature=youtu.be", "linkText": "Video Story of Mr. Fleisher's Wonderful Volunteer Work", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G99I-BpY7UE&feature=youtu.be", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, {}] };

span.h2: Superintendent Outlines Lesson Expectations as School Closure Continues

a.title: Superintendent Outlines Lesson Expectations as School Closure Continues Video Transcript

span.p: In his latest "Minute with Dr. Meloche" informational video, the superintendent on April 17, 2020 discussed the next steps in our Continuity of Learning Plan and what's ahead for spring events in light of Gov. Murphy's mandate that schools must remain closed through at least May 15.
Details of lesson expectations, by grade level, are included in the updated Continuity of Learning Plan.
Please direct questions to your child's teacher or principal.

a.title: Go to comments for Superintendent Outlines Lesson Expectations as School Closure Continues

span.h2: Free Webinar Offers Strategies for Dealing with Mental Health Challenges During COVID-19 Quarantine
span.p: Parents: Looking for help for yourself or your adolescent dealing with feelings of anxiety & depression during COVID-19? Register now via email to jbramble@highfocuscenters.com for a free webinar hosted by High Focus Centers on Tuesday, April 28, 2020 from 6-7 pm.

ul.li: Coping strategies to combat feelings of anxiety and depression
High Focus Centers' outpatient telehealth treatment option

span.p: Registration closes Monday, April 27 at 8 pm.

a.title: Go to comments for Seminar for Dealing with COVID-19 Stress

span.p: Schools remain closed through at least May 15, 2020. Meals continue to be distributed during this time to ALL FAMILIES IN THE DISTRICT WHO QUALIFY FOR FREE/REDUCED PRICE MEALS. Every Monday, students receive 2 breakfasts & 2 lunches. Every Wednesday, students receive 3 breakfasts & 3 lunches. Choose pick-up location: High School East, High School West or Clara Barton Elementary from 10 am-noon.
Please be sure to have student ID numbers ready in order to claim each student’s meal.

a.title: Go to comments for Meal Distribution for Qualifying Free/Reduced Lunch Recipients
Subscribe to RSS Feed - District News
a.span: Subscribe to RSS Feed - District News
